languageKey.label: htmlArea RTE > Abbreviation
The "Abbreviation" dialogue allows to associate an abbreviation to a term.

Clicking the "Insert abbreviation" icon in the RTE tool bar opens a dialogue that allows to insert an abbreviation or to edit one that already exists in the content. Any existing abbreviation is underlined with a broken line and the cursor changes to a question mark when the mouse goes over it. The dialogue allows to associate an abbreviation to a term. The abbreviation may be selected among abbreviations that have been pre-defined in the database or may be entered directly in the dialogue.

Pre-defined abbreviations
This section lets you select abbreviations already defined in the database.
tx_rtehtmlarea_acronym
Pre-defined acronyms
This section lets you select acronyms already defined in the database.
tx_rtehtmlarea_acronym
Unabbreviated term
Select the unabbreviated form of the term.
The selected term will be set as the title attribute of the abbreviation (or acronym) element.
Abbreviation
Select the short form of the term.
Language
Select the language for which the abbreviation is defined.

The selected language will be set as the language attribute of the abbreviation (or acronym) element. If a pre-defined abbreviation (or acronym) is selected, the language for which it is defined, if any, is initially selected.
Term to abbreviate
This section lets you enter a term for which the current selection will be the short form.
Use this term
Enter the term that you want to associate as the unabbreviated form of the current selection.
The entered term will be set as the title attribute of the abbreviation (or acronym) element.
